parameter.name: collection_path
parameter.description: Collection Path

parameter.name: delivery_path
parameter.description: Delivery Path

parameter.name: install_dir
parameter.description: EL installation directory

parameter.name: LoopCount
parameter.description: Defines how many times a non-intrusive logic operation is executed. Use to quickly increase/decrese the amount of operations executed within the node.

parameter.name: BehaviourOnError
parameter.description: Action taken in error situations.

parameter.name: BlockSize
parameter.description: The used block size in FTP transfer. In FTP files are transferred in blocks.

parameter.name: Cipher
parameter.description: Cipher used in encryption.

parameter.name: CleanUpInterval
parameter.description: The interval for cleaning up old backup files in seconds (default), minutes (m) or hours (h). Recommended value is 12h or more so that disk activity is not high. Use shorter duration like 6h if disk space is not sufficient. If both MaxDays and MaxFiles node parameters are zero, this parameter is not required. If either MaxDays or MaxFiles node parameters are non zero, both CleanUpInterval and CleanUpTime parameters cannot be empty at the same time. If both CleanUpInterval and CleanUpTime parameters are filled up, CleanUpTime parameter will be used instead of CleanUpInterval.

parameter.name: CleanUpTime
parameter.description: Specific time for daily cleaning up old backup files in 24 hours format "hh:mm". If both MaxDays and MaxFiles node parameters are zero, this parameter is not required. If either MaxDays or MaxFiles node parameters are non zero, both CleanUpInterval and CleanUpTime parameters cannot be empty at the same time. If both CleanUpInterval and CleanUpTime parameters are filled up, CleanUpTime parameter will be used instead of CleanUpInterval.

parameter.name: Compression
parameter.description: Compress data.

parameter.name: CompressionMethod
parameter.description: Compression program to be used.

parameter.name: ConnectionEstablishmentTimeout
parameter.description: Defines the time in seconds how long a connection establishment is waited for before timing out

parameter.name: ConnectionRetryCount
parameter.description: Defines the amount of retries in case the connection creation fails. Maximum value is 100.

parameter.name: ConnectionRetryInterval
parameter.description: Defines the time interval in seconds between connection retries. Maximum value is 600 seconds.

parameter.name: DailyDirectories
parameter.description: Defines whether a day specific subdirectories are created for backups.

parameter.name: DestinationHost
parameter.description: The address or name of the host where collected files are located

parameter.name: ExternalCommand
parameter.description: External command executed for each file.

parameter.name: FlagFileSuffix
parameter.description: Create a flag file with this parameter as a suffix if defined.

parameter.name: Kex
parameter.description: Key exchange algorithm

parameter.name: MaxDays
parameter.description: Expiration time in days.

parameter.name: MaxFiles
parameter.description: Maximum amount of files in backup directory.

parameter.name: MaximumReconnectionInterval
parameter.description: Defines the maximum reconnection interval. If defined, the interval sequence starts from 1 minute and is doubled after every failed reconnection attempt until the maximum value is met. After the maximum value is met, it is used as the reconnection interval until the MaximumSustainedNetworkDowntime has elapsed.

parameter.name: MaximumSustainedNetworkDowntime
parameter.description: Defines the maximum sustained network downtime before aborting the node. Given in minutes.

parameter.name: OriginalFilenameMask
parameter.description: Regular expression mask to correct original filename.

parameter.name: Password
parameter.description: Password for the connection.

parameter.name: Port
parameter.description: The port number which is used to create the connection

parameter.name: PrivateKey
parameter.description: Absolut path of the privatekey file.

parameter.name: PublicKey
parameter.description: Absolut path of the publickey file.

parameter.name: RemoteOS
parameter.description: Flavour of the remote operating system

parameter.name: RemotePrefix
parameter.description: Additional prefix added to the transferred file's filename.

parameter.name: RemoteSuffix
parameter.description: Additional suffix added to the transferred file's filename.

parameter.name: Ruleset
parameter.description: Do not touch this parameter.

parameter.name: SourceIdDirectories
parameter.description: Defines whether a SourceId specific subdirectories are created for backups.

parameter.name: TargetDirectory
parameter.description: The target directory where transferred files are put

parameter.name: TempDirectory
parameter.description: Temporary directory on the remote host where files are put before moving them to the correct output location.

parameter.name: TempSuffix
parameter.description: Temporary suffix which is removed after successfull transfer.

parameter.name: TransferMode
parameter.description: Chooses the FTP transfer mode between ascii and binary.

parameter.name: TransferProtocol
parameter.description: FTP, SFTP or Local

parameter.name: TransferRetryCount
parameter.description: Defines the amount of retries in case the file transfer fails. Maximum value is 100 retries.

parameter.name: TransferRetryInterval
parameter.description: Defines the time interval in seconds between failed file transfer retries. Maximum value is 1000 seconds.

parameter.name: TransferType
parameter.description: Chooses the FTP transfer type between active and passive.

parameter.name: Username
parameter.description: Username for the connection.

parameter.name: BehaviourOnError
parameter.description: Action taken in error situations.

parameter.name: BlockSize
parameter.description: The used block size in FTP transfer. In FTP files are transferred in blocks.

parameter.name: Cipher
parameter.description: Cipher used in encryption.

parameter.name: CleanUpInterval
parameter.description: The interval for cleaning up old backup files in seconds (default), minutes (m) or hours (h). Recommended value is 12h or more so that disk activity is not high. Use shorter duration like 6h if disk space is not sufficient. If both MaxDays and MaxFiles node parameters are zero, this parameter is not required. If either MaxDays or MaxFiles node parameters are non zero, both CleanUpInterval and CleanUpTime parameters cannot be empty at the same time. If both CleanUpInterval and CleanUpTime parameters are filled up, CleanUpTime parameter will be used instead of CleanUpInterval.

parameter.name: CleanUpTime
parameter.description: Specific time for daily cleaning up old backup files in 24 hours format "hh:mm". If both MaxDays and MaxFiles node parameters are zero, this parameter is not required. If either MaxDays or MaxFiles node parameters are non zero, both CleanUpInterval and CleanUpTime parameters cannot be empty at the same time. If both CleanUpInterval and CleanUpTime parameters are filled up, CleanUpTime parameter will be used instead of CleanUpInterval.

parameter.description: Chooses the FTP transfer type between active and passive.

parameter.name: Username
parameter.description: Username for the connection.

parameter.description: Action taken in error situations.

parameter.name: BlockSize
parameter.description: The used block size in FTP transfer. In FTP files are transferred in blocks.

parameter.name: Cipher
parameter.description: Cipher used in encryption.

parameter.name: Compression
parameter.description: Compress data.

parameter.name: ConnectionEstablishmentTimeout
parameter.description: Defines the time in seconds how long a connection establishment is waited for before timing out

parameter.name: ConnectionRetryInterval
parameter.description: Defines the time interval in seconds between connection retries. Maximum value is 600 seconds.

parameter.name: DeleteSource
parameter.description: If 'Yes' the source files will be deleted after successfull transfer.

parameter.name: ExternalCommand
parameter.description: External command executed for each file.

parameter.name: FileTransferCount
parameter.description: Defines how many files will be transferred despite the amount of available files.

parameter.name: Filename
parameter.description: Filename or a glob pattern used to define the files to be collected

parameter.name: IgnoreEmptyDirError
parameter.description: If 'Yes' errors listing directory contents are ignored.

parameter.name: InputFileList
parameter.description: A list of files to be collected

parameter.name: Kex
parameter.description: Key exchange algorithm

parameter.name: MaximumReconnectionInterval
parameter.description: Defines the maximum reconnection interval. If defined, the reconnection interval starts from 1 minute and is doubled after every failed reconnection attempt until the defined maximum value is met. After the maximum value is met, it is used as the reconnection interval until the MaximumSustainedNetworkDowntime has elapsed. Successfull reconnection resets the value.

parameter.name: MaximumSustainedNetworkDowntime
parameter.description: Defines the maximum sustained network downtime before aborting the node. Given in minutes.

parameter.name: MoveSrcToDirectory
parameter.description: The directory where successfully transferred source files are moved to.

parameter.name: Password
parameter.description: Password for the connection.

parameter.name: Port
parameter.description: The port number which is used to create the connection

parameter.name: PrivateKey
parameter.description: Absolut path of the privatekey file.

parameter.name: PublicKey
parameter.description: Absolut path of the publickey file.

parameter.name: RegexFilename
parameter.description: Filename or a regular expression used to define the files to be collected

parameter.name: RemoteOS
parameter.description: Flavour of the remote operating system

parameter.name: RemotePrefix
parameter.description: Additional prefix added to the transferred file's filename.

parameter.name: RemoteSuffix
parameter.description: Additional suffix added to the transferred file's filename.

parameter.name: Ruleset
parameter.description: File that contains user defined logic

parameter.name: SourceDirectory
parameter.description: The source directory of the files to be collected

parameter.name: SourceHost
parameter.description: The address or name of the host where collected files are located

parameter.name: TransferMode
parameter.description: Chooses the FTP transfer mode between ascii and binary.

parameter.name: TransferProtocol
parameter.description: FTP, SFTP or Local

parameter.name: TransferRetryCount
parameter.description: Defines the amount of retries in case the file transfer fails. Maximum value is 100 retries.

parameter.name: TransferRetryInterval
parameter.description: Defines the time interval in seconds between failed file transfer retries. Maximum value is 1000 seconds.

parameter.name: TransferType
parameter.description: Chooses the FTP transfer type between active and passive.

parameter.name: Username
parameter.description: Username for the connection.

parameter.name: CloseFilesAtSchedule
parameter.description: Defines if the output files can be closed in schedule.

parameter.name: CreateEmptyOutputFileOnFlush
parameter.description: Defines whether an empty output files shall be created when node is flushed.

parameter.name: CreateEmptyOutputFileOnSeparation
parameter.description: Defines whether the handling of an input file that does not contain any records or contains the control records only is indicated to the following node with an empty output file.

parameter.name: CreateEmptyOutputFiles
parameter.description: Defines whether an empty output files shall be created.

parameter.name: FileSizeLimit
parameter.description: Defines the maximum size of an output file.

parameter.name: InputFileNameExtractionMask
parameter.description: Defines the regular expression that is used extract information from original input file name for the output file name.

parameter.name: MaxAgeOfFile
parameter.description: Defines the maximum period of time that a file can be open after creation.

parameter.name: MinAgeOfFile
parameter.description: Defines the minimum period that a file must be open after its creation before it can be closed.

parameter.name: OutputDescriptionFileName
parameter.description: Defines the name of the output description file.

parameter.name: OutputFileNameCreationMask
parameter.description: Defines the output file name creation pattern to be used for output files.

parameter.name: RealTimeDelivery
parameter.description: Defines whether a control record is created containing the output record's length and offset in the output file.

parameter.name: RecordLimit
parameter.description: Defines the maximum number of records in a file before it will be closed.

parameter.name: RecordWaitingTimeLimit
parameter.description: Defines the maximum period of time that a file can be open after last record has been written to it.

parameter.name: RemoveFileTemplates
parameter.description: Defines whether memory structures of the output files are deleted after the file is sent.

parameter.name: RemoveFileTemplatesTimeout
parameter.description: Defines the period of time that the output files memory structures are kept waiting for further files to be created after the file has been sent.

parameter.name: ResetInterval
parameter.description: Defines how often the file sequence numbers in output file names are reset.

parameter.name: SeparateSequenceNumbersInFileNames
parameter.description: Defines if the output file names have common or independent sequence numbering.

parameter.name: SeparateSequenceNumbersInOutput
parameter.description: Defines if the file and record sequence counters in encoded output data have common or independent sequence numbering.

parameter.name: SeparateSourceID
parameter.description: Defines whether the input records from different sources are written to separate output files.

parameter.name: SeparationCondition
parameter.description: Defines whether input records with different values for metadata or input field are written to separate output files.

parameter.name: UniqueOutputFileNames
parameter.description: Defines if unique output file names are required.

parameter.name: Aggregation.DFDFileName
parameter.description: Name of the data format definition file

parameter.name: Aggregation.DescriptionFileName
parameter.description: Name of the aggregation instance configuration file

parameter.name: Aggregation.Instance
parameter.description: Name of the aggregation instance

parameter.name: TRS.Config
parameter.description: Table configuration file

parameter.name: TRS.ConnectString
parameter.description: Connection string

parameter.name: TRS.DataStorage
parameter.description: Name of the data store

parameter.name: TRS.DataStorageSize
parameter.description: Size of the data store in megabytes.

parameter.name: TRS.UseScalability
parameter.description: Handling of node scalability. 1=yes 0=no

parameter.name: ConfigurationFilename
parameter.description: Name of the configuration file describing the decoding rules.

parameter.name: DescriptionConflictResolution
parameter.description: Defines how to recover in case if an undescribed ASN.1 item is found from the input data.

parameter.name: DescriptionFilename
parameter.description: Name of the ASN.1 description file describing the input data.

parameter.name: DiscardFailureThreshold
parameter.description: Number of consecutive input file discardations that lead to ASN.1 Decoder execution failure

parameter.name: DiscardedFilesLink
parameter.description: Defines the output link where discarded file is discarded to.

parameter.name: HexadecimalOutputFormat
parameter.description: Defines whether hexadecimal values have lowercase or uppercase letters in the ASN.1 Decoder output.

parameter.name: OutputFilesLink
parameter.description: Defines the output link where output files are sent to.

parameter.name: RuleEngine.NumberOfDiagnosedRecords
parameter.description: Defines the number of records that has the instruction based diagnostic given when the execution starts.

parameter.name: SendDiscardedFilesToLink
parameter.description: Defines whether the discarded files are stored to the disk or sent to the a second output link.

parameter.name: UsePreConvertedDFD
parameter.description: Defines if the ASN.1 description to DFD conversion should be bypassed and ready made DFD used.

parameter.name: UseRecordSequenceNumbers
parameter.description: Defines if the sequence number should be added to output records.

parameter.name: Lookup.AbortOnReloadFailure
parameter.description: Causes the lookup library to automatically abort the node when a lookup table reloading fails.

parameter.name: Lookup.ShmidDirectory
parameter.description: Directory where Lookup Server shared memory id file is located.

parameter.name: LookupServerName
parameter.description: Lookup Server instance

parameter.name: LookupTableName
parameter.description: Lookup table name
